Title: Series: Old and New Testaments after the designs of G.B. Castiglione
Description: God orders St Joseph to leave for Egypt. On the right, St Joseph sitting on the ground, leaning on a stone; on the left, the Virgin Mary is putting the infant Jesus Christ in a cradle, watched by two little angels; God appears above, accompanied by three angels; after Giovanni Benedetto Castiglione. 1765 Etching, in brown ink
Bibliographic references: Calabi & De Vesme 1928 / Francesco Bartolozzi. Catalogue des estampes et notice biographique d'après les manuscrits de A. De Vesme entièrement réformés et complétés d'une étude critique par A. Calabi (6.I)
